name: VOX Engine Audio Pack
summary: Learn about .VXN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Several Gameloft video games, including Iron Man 3: The Official Game and Sacred Odyssey: Rise of Ayden, store their soundtracks and related metadata in VXN files.
VXN is a proprietary format, used only by Gameloft video games. Each VXN file contains a single song, split into several sections. Games can load, play, and loop each section of a VXN file as needed.
NOTE: VXN files may also be referred to as VoxN files.

instructions: You can use vgmstream (multiplatform) to play the song a VXN file contains. You can also use Foobar2000 (Windows) to play VXN files, after installing the vgmstream plug-in.
With the vgmstream plug-in installed, you can use Foobar2000 to convert VXN files to .WAV and other common audio formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
